description: Represents the data required to send an email to multiple recipients.

additionalRecipients.description: Additional e-mail addresses that should receive the mailing alongside the primary member accounts.

body.description: The body of the email. Plain text only.

emailTest.description:
Marks the email as a test. In test mode the message is only sent to the configured sender address
and appends the list of intended recipients at the end of the body.

recipients.description:
List of email recipients, as user IDs in the system.
Only active users will receive the email.

selection.description: Captures the selection parameters that produced the recipient list.

subject.description: The subject of the email. Plain text only.
